description:
NBA Live Mobile is a fun and addictive basketball game from EA Sports. In this game, you build your own NBA dream team and play against other player teams from around the world. Leveling up fast in NBA Live Mobile can help you unlock better players, boosts and abilities. Here are some tips on how to level up faster in NBA Live Mobile:

1.Complete achievements - Many achievements reward you with a good amount of XP. Go to the Achievements tab and complete the easy ones first that give significant XP.

2. Play Seasons - Season mode matches reward you with XP based on how many quarters you play. Try to play at least 3 quarters in each season match for maximum XP gain.

3.Complete Live Events - Daily, hourly and blitz live events reward you with XP upon completion. Make sure to play as many live events as you can.

4. Upgrade players - Upgrading your players also rewards you with XP. Use the coins you earn to upgrade your best players to increase your team's overall rating and get more XP.

5. Level up boosts - Certain boosts like "XP Boost" and "Level Boost" can help you gain XP and level up faster upon activation. Use these boosts before playing events for maximum benefit.

6. Complete Objectives - Go to the Objectives tab to see XP objectives that reward you upon completion. Knock out as many objectives as you can.

7.Claim EXP Packs - Use your coin to claim EXP packs from the store. These packs usually contain a decent amount of XP to help boost your level.
name: NBA Live Mobile
